
```{r}

```

```{r}
jdcitys <- jdcitys[jdcitys$ym != "2018-09月",]
```



## 3. 东中西三部分

```{r}
jd1718 <- read.csv("D:\\data\\sx_raw\\交调数据\\jd20172018.csv",stringsAsFactors = F)
dim(jd1718)
```


```{r}
jd1718s <- handle_gather_forym(jd1718)
```

```{r}
caculate_frecarsmean(jd1718s,c("ym","province")) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(ym,Wmean,group=province,colour=province))+geom_point()+geom_line()+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 10, angle = 90))
```
